basics.name: Shirmond Conway
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A motivated individual who gets things done.

work.summary: Software Developer Level 3 engaging in Technical Lead responsibilities.
highlights: Implement Web API Azure Cloud Service layer using OData as part of a Scrum team
Create Remote Catpure to ERP Integration solution using WCF Services
Develop ASP.NET MVC 3 Program Manager application that allowed data entry of Broadcast and Marketing users for the Enjoying Everyday Life TV program
Implement the PayPal Payflow Pro API during migration of Canadian payment provider to utilize tokenization for PCI Compliance
